textBox.richText: Woke up to 5.5" on the ground...enough to cover the icy bumps. Gunter, Max and I headed out early...did a BUNCH of trees and fresh tracks. Tried to get over to Eagle Wind, but although they said the run was open, it was roped off (so we had to ditch into the switchyard trees). Showed them the brakeman trees, did lower tophers, the frenchman trees, the do-or-die trees...all good! And, the highlight: Gunter does the bridge between Cranmer and Outrigger!
